LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_SurgerySuccessChance: The base chance that a character will succeed when performing an operation on artificial units. The actual success chance is also affected by factors like facilities, room cleanliness, medicine used, the difficulty of the operation, and inspirations.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_OperationSpeed.label: artificial operation speed
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_OperationSpeed.descr: The speed at which the character performs artificial operations.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_TendQuality.label: artificial tend quality
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_TendQuality.descript: The base quality of tending given when repairing integrity damage.\n\nThe actual tend quality will also be affected by factors like medicine used, facilities, luck, and so on.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_TendSpeed.label: artificial tend speed
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_TendSpeed.descriptio: Speed at which the character tends to integrity damage.
